BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on the racial and gender makeup of applicants for firefighter civil service examinations, and admission and graduation statistics from the probationary firefighter school.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
